member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile
member.summary: Defines a launch profile for orchestrating application startup.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile.Name
member.summary: Profile name (e.g., "desktop", "errorlogviewer", "fusion").

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile.Description
member.summary: Human-readable description.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile.Applications
member.summary: Applications to launch in this profile.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile.HealthChecks
member.summary: Health checks to perform before launching.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile.ExitPolicy
member.summary: Exit policy (e.g., "WaitForAll", "WaitForAny", "FireAndForget").

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile.RequiresElevation
member.summary: Whether this profile requires elevation.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchProfile.StartupDelayMs
member.summary: Startup delay in milliseconds between launching applications.

member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition
member.summary: Defines an application to launch.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.Name
member.summary: Application name for display.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.ExecutablePath
member.summary: Relative path to executable from LaunchControl directory.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.Arguments
member.summary: Command-line arguments.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Working directory (defaults to executable directory).

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.RequiresElevation
member.summary: Whether this application requires elevation.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.WaitForExit
member.summary: Whether to wait for this application to exit before continuing.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.TimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds for waiting (0 = infinite).

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.ApplicationDefinition.Optional
member.summary: Whether this application is optional (failure doesn't stop profile).

member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.HealthCheck
member.summary: Defines a health check to perform before launching.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.HealthCheck.Type
member.summary: Check type (e.g., "FileExists", "DirectoryExists", "PortAvailable", "DotNetRuntime").

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.HealthCheck.Target
member.summary: Check target (e.g., file path, port number).

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.HealthCheck.Description
member.summary: Human-readable description of what this check validates.

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.HealthCheck.Required
member.summary: Whether this check is required (failure stops launch).

member.name: P:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.HealthCheck.AutoFix
member.summary: Auto-fix action if check fails (e.g., "CreateDirectory", "DownloadFile").

member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.HealthCheckResult
member.summary: Result of a health check.

member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Models.LaunchResult
member.summary: Result of launching an application.

member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Services.ApplicationLauncher
member.summary: Launches applications with proper error handling and elevation support.

member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Services.HealthChecker
member.summary: Performs health checks before launching applications.

member.name: T:GGs.LaunchControl.Services.PrivilegeChecker
member.summary: Checks current privilege level and elevation status.

member.name: M:GGs.LaunchControl.Services.PrivilegeChecker.IsElevated
member.summary: Checks if the current process is running with administrator privileges.

member.name: M:GGs.LaunchControl.Services.PrivilegeChecker.GetCurrentUser
member.summary: Gets the current user name.

member.name: M:GGs.LaunchControl.Services.PrivilegeChecker.GetIntegrityLevel
member.summary: Gets the integrity level of the current process.
